lead_paragraph: THE SUFFERERS BY THE BRILLIANT.--The following letter, which we copy from The N. O. Picayune, gives the names of some of the unfortunate sufferers by the explosion of the Brilliant: PLAQUEMINE, Tuesday, Sept. 30, EDITORS PICAYUNE: I send you the names of the following men which have been brought to Pisquemine, by Steamboat Natchez No. 2, sufferers by the dreadful explosion of the steamboat Brilliant, Capt. Hart. [Those marked thus * are still living.]
